data.title: Private Equity Investments
data.text:
National

The State Investment Council has been investing in private equity funds since 1989, and currently has over $3.1 billion in assets and a long-term allocation target of 13% for this strategy. Mercer consults the Council regarding its private equity portfolio and performs due diligence on prospective fund investments. Private equity commitments are also vetted during public meetings of the Council Investment Committee, followed by a vote of the full Council. The Council currently has exposure to hundreds of private companies, through dozens of managers and more than 100 limited partnerships.

New Mexico
